website_summaries.verdict: Protects up to 12 hrs. Guards against mosquitoes and a few other types of biting insects.
pros: Resists sweat and water for long-lasting protection
Stable in all kinds of temperatures
Formula developed by military for use all over world
DEET concentration of 33% delivers good results
cons: Lotion has a sticky consistency which can be off-putting

customer_reviews.title: Works very well.
customer_reviews.text: I went to Florida on vacation. I was about to have a baby and while the threat of Zika had passed I wanted to be extra cautious. Background: if I am standing in a crowd of people and ten mosquitos fly by, I will get bitten by all ten mosquitos while everyone else stays untouched While wearing this stuff in Florida I didn’t get one single mosquito bite and I was outside all day and night. I was out on boats, in fields, by the water, etc. this is good stuff.
customer_reviews.author: Here's Johnny

customer_reviews.title: No bug bites!
customer_reviews.text: I brought this with me while traveling in Cambodia and Vietnam, where there are a ton of mosquitoes and flies. I recommend putting it on even when you’re going to sleep if you’re paranoid. I was bite free in the day when I did have it on and on my last night in Vietnam, I didn’t apply it back on after showering and went to bed, and I woke up next morn to two bits near my elbows. All in all, it does it’s job as long as you keep using it. A bit of a note, it does leave a bit of a sticky residue after application and drying, but I can say this does repel flies and bugs.
customer_reviews.author: velvetdreams

customer_reviews.title: Very Effective in Low-Risk Region of India
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because it has a high DEET %, lasts 12 hours, and was less than 3oz (can carry on an airplane). I was really impressed with how much area a small amount of lotion would cover. It also was effective for at least 8 hours and often close to 12 hours (as claimed). We were in low risk areas of India doing typical sightseeing activities, so we didn’t put it through a tougher test. But there were mosquitoes around when the sun went down and this was very effective about keeping them away. I forgot to put it on my ankles one day and that night got a couple of bites.
customer_reviews.author: Michael N

customer_reviews.title: This product works the best. Forget name brands!
customer_reviews.text: This cream is the best thing in the market. SERIOUSLY I put this on and not one mosquito got close to me. I bought some to give away to my family members that live in Texas where mosquitos and other biting insects are vicious. They love it! They had been using the brand name spray (you know which one I’m talking about) and they were bitten like crazy. So I gave them this to try and were so impressed. Yes it’s a bit pricey for the small tubes but I don’t think you need much.
customer_reviews.author: Bebbe

customer_reviews.title: Magical
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is amazing. I am a mosquito magnet, but I wore this during a week-long trip through the jungles of southern Mexico and I didn't get a single bug bite while my fellow travelers were struggling. I was shocked. It was actually recommended to my mom by a military doctor who said this is the stuff he recommends for soldiers going overseas. Turned out it really was that legit.
customer_reviews.author: Unknown

customer_reviews.title: It works against flies, ticks, other bugs.
customer_reviews.text: I run at a park near a horse farm. The flies are huge, also deer population, this stuff is really, really, effective against pesky flies, ticks, and other pests.... I've given it to friends for camping trips.. Excellent product and works. It's gotten pricy. But I need it to run in the park..
customer_reviews.author: BeeGee

customer_reviews.title: Mosquitos beware:  Ultrathon is your enemy!
customer_reviews.text: This is THE best mosquito repellent for major mosquito infested environments. This product totally saved my friends and I in the jungles of Peru and again later in Costa Rica. We were mosquito and bite free even after hiking in the jungle day and night with bird-sized mosquitos thirsting after us. Luckily, other travelers had not discovered Ultrathon lotion and the mosquitos did not starve on that trip. We, however, escaped bite (and Zika) free after 5 days in the Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Ms Paige

customer_reviews.title: Of course never would recommend putting on the face
customer_reviews.text: Worked very well in the Philippines. No bites when covered with this. Only thing is the smell can be intense and overwhelming at times. When too close to the eyes on the face fumes are strong and can lead to eyes watering and stinging. Of course never would recommend putting on the face, but I wanted full coverage. My mistake was rubbing my back of my hands on my face/eyelids accidentally and that causes
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great mosquito repellant
customer_reviews.text: I have been buying this product from Amazon for quite a while, this is the only Insect repellant that will remove the threat of the Zica virus . OI have been using this for many years. The only thing I wish is that 3M had not stopped using the sponge applicator. I wrote and asked them why, they said it didn't go over. I can't figure why not, with the sponge applicator meant you didn't have to get it on your hands, but other than that I will not use anything other than Ultrathon.
customer_reviews.author: John W. Green

customer_reviews.title: 5 stars
customer_reviews.text: If you travel to areas with a lot of mosquitos then you definitely want this! I’ve used this in Rio and Panama and wasn’t bitten. Amazing product- highly recommend. There is 1 thing to note- you do feel a little sticky after application, but that’s the only downside I can think of.
customer_reviews.author: Elise Kuhar-Pitters

customer_reviews.title: THE REAL DEAL
customer_reviews.text: This stuff works! It is intense if you slather it on you will feel dizzy (not only have I had this experience but so did my friends that I shared it with). I highly recommend if you are going somewhere that you don't want to risk getting bitten by the bugs. Also a little bit goes a long way with this stuff.
customer_reviews.author: Marty McFly

customer_reviews.title: The best
customer_reviews.text: This stuff really works. I cant tell you how many times I have been camping and even after 16 hours this stuff is keeping the mosquitos off. Also it doesn't feel thick, oily, smelly, and smothering like all other bug repellents. The smell is extremely mild and completely disappears after an hour.
customer_reviews.author: Captain that guy

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic travel companion
customer_reviews.text: We went to Costa Rica for 9 days and I had maybe 2 bites on me the whole time. We didn't even use a quarter of the bottle. You do have to make sure to have access to a water source to wipe off your hands after applying, which is expected from a lotion. It feels light on application, yet smooth and strong. We zip-lined, hiked a waterfall, visited the hanging bridges, went to the beach and so much more. The travel size was perfect for international travel.
customer_reviews.author: Kelso

customer_reviews.title: Keep yourself safe from harm when outdoors...
customer_reviews.text: This is by FAR the BEST insect repellent we have EVER used! My husband suffered from terrible itching whelts and we never did figure out what was biting him but the Ultrathon kept him from getting any new bites after he started using it before he went out into the woods hunting or out to do weed whacking around our house. We both highly recommend it as a precaution before any outdoor activities if you think you might be bitten by insects or bugs.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy dancer

customer_reviews.title: Best bug repellant ever
customer_reviews.text: This is the best bug repellant I have EVER used. I wore it in Peru for the Inca trail and in Machu Picchu and didn't get a single bug bite (and bugs love me). We met other people who had an inch of ankle showing and got bug bites to the point they couldn't walk the next day. We used this bug repellant and neither of us got a single bite, even in the jungle.
customer_reviews.author: Erin Gleeson

customer_reviews.title: It is effective, non- greasy, and has only a faint smell when applied.
customer_reviews.text: Protects from Florida mosquitos! I prefer applying this lotion to sprays. I also like the non-greasy non-sticky texture after you apply it. The smell is faint compared to other mosquito repellants. This lotion allows me to enjoy being outside in my mosquito attack zone! It is expensive but I try to use it sparingly and it still is effective!
customer_reviews.author: Dawn Treader

customer_reviews.title: As good as I expected.
customer_reviews.text: I recently took these with me on a trip internationally. they performed well enough however i found that it washed off rather easily. not much else to say other than it worked as well as to be expected. I don't blame this product for being somewhat in effective as the insect population where i traveled to was astounding. I doubt any other repellent would have performed any better than this given the voracity of the mosquitoes i encountered.
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: Lasts all day!
customer_reviews.text: Have to use deer to keep all of the mosquitos away. My son and husband need nothing, but my daughter and I are tasty and can not walk to the car without being bit. This leaves no oily film and truly lasts for 12 hours.
customer_reviews.author: K. Armstrong

customer_reviews.title: Really does the job !
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is awesome. We went traveling in the tropics. Last time we went, we had very bad experience with no-see-ums. Two years later we were committed to trying to find something that would keep us protected. This stuff worked splendidly and is a very thick lotion and stays put on your skin for so much longer than any of the sprays. I would highly recommend this to anyone who needs significant protection from mosquitos and no-see-ums.
customer_reviews.author: doggrrl

customer_reviews.title: The first time I went into the jungle I brought ...
customer_reviews.text: The first time I went into the jungle I brought many kinds of mosquito repellant because mosquitos find me everywhere. I left all of them behind but Ultrathon. Numerous jungles and trips later I have successfully avoided all mosquitos because of the Ultrathon lotion. It is a must buy for places with mosquitos.
customer_reviews.author: ecatzippy

customer_reviews.title: Kept my mind at peace
customer_reviews.text: My wife and I went to Cancun last week, she is 10 weeks pregnant, the doctor was concerned about zika virus (altough it's no longer a threat there) and she promised she would take extreme precaution. we bought this product based on it's reviews and it worked flawlessly for her, and I only got one bite (on the hand, in a place where it wasn't applied). Texture remains sticky after hours of it being applied, and it smells like glue, but it works like a charm.
customer_reviews.author: José Antonio Soto Villacampa

customer_reviews.title: PostIt Note Glue with DDT
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is hard to get out of your skin, even with soap and water. It keeps insects away for sure, but smells like PostIt Note glue and will eat up certain materiel clothing.
customer_reviews.author: R C

customer_reviews.title: Strong, really strong
customer_reviews.text: It worked for our swamp trip, so I was happy about that. The catch with these is they apparently counter-act sunscreen which was a bit problematic and after an hour I felt the slight burn on my arms. It has a very strong smell which is great for repelling insects .
customer_reviews.author: OA

customer_reviews.title: I take it wherever I travel.
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this insect repellent for over 15 years now and is a regular fixture in my suitcase wherever I travel (domestic and international). In case you venture out without a repellent and get bitten, I found that applying this lotion after the fact soothes the irritation quite well.
customer_reviews.author: BVK

customer_reviews.title: For Use on your body for protection
customer_reviews.text: This works !!! Another product recommended by Travel Medicine RN. This truly works when you put it on before leaving to go outdoors where there are insects that will bite. I used it on my face, arms, and legs. When I didn't remember to put in on my legs, my ankles were bitten by mosquitoes. I ran out of the repellent on the last day of my trip, and was bitten on the hand by some insect. I recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Peace Seeker

customer_reviews.title: Too sticky
customer_reviews.text: This was more convenient and less messy than traditional deet spray, but the consistency was rather thick and remained sticky on the skin even after allowing for time to absorb. While both seemed effective in repelling mosquitos, I also tried the sawyer brand repellant lotion and the feeling on the skin was much lighter and cleaner.
customer_reviews.author: JJ

customer_reviews.title: Best I've Used
customer_reviews.text: Has worked very well camping in the Northeast US as well as on a few Caribbean and Central American trips. While I prefer the cream because you have better control over how much you apply where, I have also tried the skin spray which worked very well. Have also had a good experience with the gear spray (i.e. protect your Hat, backpack, shirt, tent) which keeps you from having to apply as much to your skin . Nice Job 3M, on this product line.
customer_reviews.author: KB

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend this!
customer_reviews.text: I received the the repellent today and have already used it...no issues with bugs at all. And we have a nasty black fly and mosquito issue. Highly recommend this!
customer_reviews.author: Rob Lynch

customer_reviews.title: Great stuff
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is great. I keep a travel size bottle in my luggage, my backpack, and my fiancée keeps one in her purse. A little goes a long way and you don’t have to cover yourself in bug spray for it to be effective.
customer_reviews.author: Murph

customer_reviews.title: Sweats off
customer_reviews.text: Easy apply. Flies still come sometimes. Might have sweated it off but that’s why I got it in the first place
customer_reviews.author: Kevin

customer_reviews.title: This is one of the only few items I would ...
customer_reviews.text: This is one of the only few items I would bring traveling abroad because I trust this insect repellent lotion. My friend forgot to apply on this elbow. The next morning, he got 20 bites. Small enough to carry onboard without checking.
customer_reviews.author: Linh Hoang

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Repellent
customer_reviews.text: I work this in the Iguazu national park/Atlantic Rainforest in Argentina. I didn't get one bite! This stuff is AMAZING!!
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca O'Reilly

customer_reviews.title: I wouldn't recommend using it in humid climates or if you're going ...
customer_reviews.text: Sticky product, but works very well! I wouldn't recommend using it in humid climates or if you're going to be sweating a lot as the stickiness gets a little gross in those situations.
customer_reviews.author: Julia Millet

customer_reviews.title: The BEST
customer_reviews.text: I literally never get bitten when I use this stuff. Used it camping multiple times and I never get bit.
customer_reviews.author: Melania

customer_reviews.title: Ultrathon is the best "pest" protection available
customer_reviews.text: Ultrathon is the best "pest" protection available. It has protected me in the woods hunting, in Africa, and in the Amazon jungle without a single bite. If it is good enough for the military, it is good enough for me. The product was delivered quickly and as promised. I highly recommend its use.
customer_reviews.author: Tracy RobyTop Contributor: Camping

customer_reviews.title: I travel to the Philippines often in other countries in ...
customer_reviews.text: I travel to the Philippines often in other countries in Southeast Asia. Unfortunately it's hard to find in stores in other countries. So, I have to stock up and buy several bottles before each trip. Soon I'll be moving to South East Asia so I guess so need to buy maybe 10 bottles? :-)
customer_reviews.author: JJ

customer_reviews.title: The BEST insect repellant out there
customer_reviews.text: The BEST insect repellant out there. I like to apply every 6 hours. It's a little greasy, but it's the only product I've found to repel mosquitos and gnats while deep in the forest. I've been using it for years. A+
customer_reviews.author: Sellstar928

customer_reviews.title: I tell EVERYONE to get this! It’s a Must for travelers!
customer_reviews.text: I like that it’s easy to travel with and there is nothing better than this to prevent bug bites during camping, traveling, and any outdoor bugs!
customer_reviews.author: OG

customer_reviews.title: Insects literally bounced off me!!!
customer_reviews.text: A must for anyone traveling where mosquitos pose a threat. I used these on my recent trip to India and it worked great. Bugs literally bounced off me. The product is easy to apply, the smell is mild, and the size of the tube is small enough to easily carry with you.
customer_reviews.author: Ba

customer_reviews.title: Great protection
customer_reviews.text: Lasted all day in India’s 95* to 100* weather. Not oily or greasy when applied lightly and thoroughly.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel K

customer_reviews.title: This stuff is great! It's a little sticky in humid weather but ...
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is great! It's a little sticky in humid weather but it kept the mosquitos away in Honduras when we went horseback riding. With the Zika virus around we wanted to be safe.
customer_reviews.author: doctorjohnny

customer_reviews.title: The high deet concentration and lotion style keeps bugs away
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use cream and high deet percentage keeps bugs away
customer_reviews.author: L Krueger

customer_reviews.title: Great Stuff, a little goes a long long way...
customer_reviews.text: Works well but use sparingly because this stuff can make you ill. You do NOT need to use very much, a little bit of this stuff goes a long long way. This product was developed originally for special forces.
customer_reviews.author: Malcapo

customer_reviews.title: 8 weeks in India, I only had one mosquito ...
customer_reviews.text: 8 weeks in India, I only had one mosquito bite and it was when I wasn’t wearing the lotion. Feel confident in this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Faith

customer_reviews.title: A little goes a long way. This cream is ...
customer_reviews.text: A little goes a long way. This cream is thick and needs to be rubbed in but it works!! Since I found this product it is a must have for protection against mosquitos and alike when I travel.
customer_reviews.author: BLESSED

customer_reviews.title: Worked great for our trip to Costa Rica
customer_reviews.text: Worked great for our trip to Costa Rica. There were hundreds of mosquitos during our hike and I only got one bite on my elbow where I must not have applied any. The only negative comment I have about this product is the strong smell, but at least it keeps the bugs away!
customer_reviews.author: Vytaute Paskauskaite

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Worked very well on game preserves in Africa where there are many insects.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra Wetzler

customer_reviews.title: Great value deal
customer_reviews.text: Great value deal. This stuff has the consistency of sunscreen and I have the feeling that the repellent effect lasts longer than with other products I have used.
customer_reviews.author: MK

customer_reviews.title: So So
customer_reviews.text: It works OK and doesn't smell bad, but considering that it is so thick that it takes half a tube for one application, it is cost prohibitive. I won't but this again.
customer_reviews.author: Sanderson

customer_reviews.title: Perfect to keep away the bugs
customer_reviews.text: Kept away the bugs but I think I damages the skin tone
customer_reviews.author: Pawan Kalyan

customer_reviews.title: This product does what it is meant to do keeping ...
customer_reviews.text: This product does what it is meant to do keeping those insects away. Will continue to order this product as needed.
customer_reviews.author: Sue

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This covers better than the spray, and you really can see where you have applied.
customer_reviews.author: Ameneh Bordi

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Took this to India and it works great even for kids!!
customer_reviews.author: shalu k.

customer_reviews.title: Good Stuff
customer_reviews.text: I like it as it is not oily and I can wear nail polish without it melting if I am careful.
customer_reviews.author: Ultraviolet

customer_reviews.title: I've used this product before and it worked better than anything I've used before
customer_reviews.text: I've used this product before and it worked better than anything I've used before. My husband and I are going on a cruise next month. The Panama Canal. There is a stop in Costa Rica so I'm sure we'll do a tour of the rainforest so wanted to make sure we were well protected. I'm sure this will do it!
customer_reviews.author: Judy

customer_reviews.title: Best bug repellent I have ever used, hands down.
customer_reviews.text: This stuff simply keeps bugs off of you - it is the best bug repellent I have ever used.
customer_reviews.author: Spencer L

customer_reviews.title: Works Well!!
customer_reviews.text: This was perfect for my trip to Tanzania!! No mosquito bites at all!!
customer_reviews.author: Love2cee

customer_reviews.title: Love this stuff
customer_reviews.text: Love this stuff. Use it for when my grandson comes over and we play outside till midnight. . I can hear them buzzing, but never a bite with this
customer_reviews.author: pmw

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Worked beautifully as far as I know since I never got any bites
customer_reviews.author: SteveM

customer_reviews.title: No bug bites for us with this product.
customer_reviews.text: Worked great, no bugs even thought about coming near us. We were in the Dominican Republic and used this in case of Mosquitos. Yes it is heavy and feels greasy, but no bugs for us. We loved it.
customer_reviews.author: 1998RC

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Used this against the mosquitoes in India. Was not very effective and did not last very long .
customer_reviews.author: JCAATX

customer_reviews.title: To my fellow mosquito/bug magnets, this is the one!
customer_reviews.text: I am a mosquito magnet and have the scars to prove it, haha. I have tried nearly every natural and chemical repellent available, and this stuff is outstanding. My only issue was that it is pretty thick, so I had to restock several times. So, it can get pricey. To stretch it a bit, I would put on baby oil or sunscreen on first, and use a little less Ultrathon. Using this product, I was only bitten on the face (since I don't put repellent on there). It lasts a super long time, through sweat and sand too. I really can't say enough about this stuff.
customer_reviews.author: M. Kabigting

customer_reviews.title: Recommend this product highly
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Used it in South Africa and Tanzania during a sarfari.
customer_reviews.author: Scott C. Goldner

customer_reviews.title: This stuff is amazing. I was in the some deep woods in ...
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is amazing. I was in the some deep woods in latin america and came out with zero bites.
customer_reviews.author: Shopper190

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Best mosquito repellent I have ever used. Isn't smelly or stickey. Lasts all day.
customer_reviews.author: Laurie Morrill

customer_reviews.title: This product was highly recommended to me by the International Medicine Clinic I went ...
customer_reviews.text: It was so dry in South Africa & Zambia that I only saw a few mosquitoes! This product was highly recommended to me by the International Medicine Clinic I went to before I traveled.
customer_reviews.author: Book Bug

customer_reviews.title: It is easy to apply and takes very little
customer_reviews.text: This is very effective mosquito repellent. It is easy to apply and takes very little.
customer_reviews.author: Steve Williams

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: This is the only product that protects me against mosquitoes!!!
customer_reviews.author: Bijan Marjan

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: It even works against Chiggers, which is a big deal here in Texas!
customer_reviews.author: Dwight Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Mosquitoes truly hate it!
customer_reviews.text: Great lotion! I wore it for two weeks in Brazil, including in the Amazon and I did not get a single mosquito bite.
customer_reviews.author: Gilberto

customer_reviews.title: Mosquito Repellent
customer_reviews.text: Great for mosquitos, just remember to apply everywhere including under your shirt.
customer_reviews.author: Momoyo Yamada

customer_reviews.title: It's the best!! My daughter went to jamaican had she ...
customer_reviews.text: It's the best !! My daughter went to jamaican had she return without a bite mark !! Just love it
customer_reviews.author: georgia palmer

customer_reviews.title: I went on a mission trip to Haiti and this ...
customer_reviews.text: I went on a mission trip to Haiti and this was a neccessity. Protected all of my team from the Chicken Gunya virus!
customer_reviews.author: Dustine Willner

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Should be enough for two. Using spray on clothing, and this on exposed s***.
customer_reviews.author: STEVEN E. BRUCE

customer_reviews.title: ... in the rural areas of the Philippines after the super typhoon in November 2013
customer_reviews.text: I used this during a medical mission in the rural areas of the Philippines after the super typhoon in November 2013. Worked very well. I tend to get bitten easily and usually I had 0 to 3 bites per day in areas I probably did not cover. I bought more for another month long assignment because it's the most effective mosquito repellent I've ever used!
customer_reviews.author: Dessaster

product_meta.title: 3M Ultrathon Insect Repellent Lotion, 2-Ounce (3-Tubes)
feature_bullets: UltrathonTM Insect Repellent was initially developed by 3M for the US Military to provide up to 12 hours of protection for their troops. It is still used today
Splash & Sweat resistant to ensure consistent protection through all your outdoor activities.
UltrathonTM has been tested in the harshest environments in the world
Time Release Protection means DEET is slower to evaporate and provides protection after others have dissipated - up to 12 hours of protection against mosquitoes.
Advanced 3M formulation creates an effective barrier that repels mosquitoes and ticks

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.6 out of 5 stars203 ratings4.6 out of 5 stars
